altTitles.ja: バキ道

description.en: After more than 2,000 years, Nomi no Sukune's successor is born. This time, Baki will challenge the god of sumo.
description.ru: Продолжение серии манги Бойца Баки. После "победы" над воскрешённым "богом меча" Миямото Мусаси в этот раз история столкнёт главных персонажей с потомком "бога сумо" и его бандой сумоистов.
description.tr: 2000 yıldan fazla bir süre sonra, Nomi no Sukune'nin halefi doğuyor. Bu kez, Baki sumo tanrısına meydan okuyacak.

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

ハッピーセピア: 大熊らすこ作品集

description.en: High school girl Kaede decided to travel back in time for her beloved benefactor, Minami. Let's see how her determination will change the flow of time. This is a time slip 4-koma manga connected by wishes and wills!
description.ja:
高校1年生のかえでは大好きな人のために過去へ旅立つことに。
彼女の想いがどう流れを変えていくのか…！
想いが想いを繋ぐタイムトラベル4コマ！

title.en: Jitsu wa Ryouomoi Kamo Shirenai Onee-san to Chuusan Danshi no Hanashi

description.en:
Short stories about Yuu, his vigorous childhood friend, and their mutual love.  
  
The volume release comes with other similar stories made by the author, most (if not all) of which can be found in their Pixiv.
description.vi: Truyện ngắn về hai chị em thuở nhỏ.

altTitles.en: The Young Lady Is a Royal Chef

altTitles.es: La princesa es un chef imperial

altTitles.ja: お嬢様はロイヤル・シェフ

description.en:
Sena’s been tossed into another world, as the despised daughter of a noble family. Her little restaurant was her refuge in her last life, so she’s got some tricks up her sleeve—cooking skills! 

As Senianna, she’ll put her brains and fine-tuned taste buds (Korean fried chicken, anyone?) to the test so she can take back the kitchen and gain this society’s esteemed title of Chef Royale. Will her cuisine reign supreme over the empire and bring her the sweet and salty balance of power and affection?

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
---
As a chef at a small knight's restaurant, I became the nuisance youngest daughter of a powerful man who was afraid of the emperor. I tried to run away with all my travel expenses…

It’s strange.

“If you say you're sorry, are you that shameless?”
“That’s because I’m your brother.”
“Why don't you take Grandmother on a stroll?”

Why is everyone so nice to me all of a sudden?

“Why do you want to take out someone's eyeballs when they see me?"

People who had caught me trying to escape. I'm just cooking. What's wrong with you?
description.id:
Aku yang dulu hidup dalam penderitaan sewaktu kecil, kini berhasil menjalankan restoran kecil di pinggir jalan dengan guruku yang menjadi orang tua sekaligus teman terbaikku.

Hingga suatu saat, guruku meninggal. Tapi, kemalanganku tidak berhenti di sana. Aku meninggal dan mendapati diriku di dunia lain. Aku kembali hidup sebagai cucu orang paling kuat di wilayah timur?!

Mendapati diriku sebagai Seniana, sekarang aku harus berjuang menjalani hidup dan menjadi royal chef paling hebat!

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
description.ko:
작은 기사 식당의 요리사였던 나는 황제도 두려워하는 권력가의 천덕꾸러기 막내딸이 되었다.
여비를 저축해 도망치려고 했는데…

이상하다.

"네게 미안하다고 하면 염치가 없는 건가."
"그야 내가 네 오빠니까."
"할애비와 산책해 주지 않는 거냐."

다들 갑자기 왜 잘해 주는 거지?

"너를 보는 놈들의 눈알을 죄 뽑아 버리고 싶은 건 왜일까요."

도망치려는 나와 붙잡는 사람들.
요리만 했을 뿐인데 왜 이러는 거람…

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 2-bu 「Hon no Tamenara Miko ni Naru!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll Do Anything to Become a Librarian~ Part 2 "I'll Become a Shrine Maiden for Books!"
Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll Do Anything to Become a Librarian~ Part 2 "I'll Even Join the Temple to Read Books!"

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上 ～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～ 第二部 「本のためなら巫女になる！」

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 2-bu 「Hon no Tamenara Miko ni Naru!」

description.en:
After the discussions with the temple master and head priest ended, Myne won the right to be treated as a noble with the role of a blue-robed shrine maiden apprentice.   
Work in the temple began and Myne could read books in the long-awaited temple library.   
However, there were many problems in the temple, such as adapting to the class system and dealing with the problem children assigned to her as attendants.   
Overcome adversity to be able to read books in peace!   
A biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms! The second part begins!

The best way for the diverse human beings who make up society to unite is to find themselves a common enemy. School is a mini-version of society, so why shouldn't the same thing happen in a classroom setting?  
  
This particular class has chosen Xiao Shang to be that common enemy. But one of its more popular students soon finds himself becoming intrigued by Shang's unapologetic, straightforward way of life.  

This comic is posted for free on the author's weibo: <https://weibo.com/u/3567976483>
description.pl: Najłatwiejszym sposobem zjednoczenia się różnorodnych jednostek, które tworzą społeczeństwo, jest znalezienie wspólnego wroga. Szkoła jest mini społeczeństwem, więc czy to samo nie powinno odbywać się w klasie? Ta konkretna klasa wybrała na wspólnego wroga Xu Shanga. Ale wkrótce jeden z najpopularniejszych uczniów w szkole staje się zaintrygowany specyficznym życiem Shanga.
description.pt-br: Ao e Xun são amigos desde a infância que mantêm um relacionamento secreto fora da escola, na mesma escola existe o aluno transferido Xiao Shang que esconde uma vida totalmente diferente através de sua natureza tranquila. Círculos Sociais significam aceitações e esses meninos buscam uma forma de como se encaixar nesse meio.

altTitles.ja: 軍靴のバルツァー
Gunka no Baltzer
Gunka no Balzer

altTitles.fr: Baltzar: La guerre dans le sang

description.en:
Glory is won over the roar of cannon fire. Peace exists simply as a time to prepare for the next battle. In a nation with superb military power, Bernd Baltzar advanced quickly through the ranks. However, his career now takes a sudden turn when he is reassigned to being the military advisor in a neighboring allied nation with little military power and a lack of civilian support of firearms. Will Major Baltzar be able to win the hearts and minds of both the soldiers and civilians in this country?  

---

**Retail Links:**

Random short comics of or relating to Genya. Rather than uploading them separately, we've uploaded them all under one title for your convenience. If you like them, please consider showing support for the artist by purchasing the doujinshi or by retweeting/liking the comic. You can find links to the author's Twitter in the comments section or credits page.

While at the get-together party, Cheng Jiahong recalled getting acquainted with his close friend, Qi Wenrui. Due to his grades being in the last rank and having to repeat the same grade again, it was arranged that Cheng Jiahong be seatmates with the class committee member Qi Wenrui. The two became familiar with each other as they spent their days together. "A life under the pressure of both specialized and literacy classes is very tiring, but, thankfully I'm not alone."

On the eve of civil chaos during the last years of Sui dynasty, with the rise of a reign of terror around the country, various peoples' feelings of grudge and animosity develop.

description.en: Toto is a novice hero who has finally put together the team that he'd always wanted. And he's ready to set out on a new adventure. But Toto's new party members' actual target is... his life?!

description.en:
Suddenly, a fleet of ships with mysterious super-weapons called the "Fleet of Fog" appeared all around the world. Humanity didn't have the technology to fight such a fleet, so they were driven out of the sea…  
Seventeen years after the battle, for some reason, Gunzou Chihaya and his crewmates aboard the I-401 and the personification (Mental Model) of the I-401, Iona, started fighting the Fleet of Fog…  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: Flowers Blooming From the Palm of Your Hand

altTitles.es-la: Flores que brotan de la palma de tu mano

description.en:
Jaekyung, 'the son of a chaebol group who acts as a hobby' , can't forget the boy in his memory who keeps appearing in his dreams and disturbing his mind after meeting him once three years ago.

One day, I stopped by my cousin Tae-ha's office and encountered the boy swallowing Tae-ha's place (giving blowjob).
Suhyeon, a member of the popular idol group 'Midnight', said he was living on a sponsorship basis, so I went to him and said, "It doesn't matter what I do with anyone."
Jaekyung is engulfed in the urge to shake him up.
description.fr:
Seo Jaegyeong est un chaebol d’un riche groupe, et agit au gré de ses envies. Il ne peut néanmoins pas oublier ce garçon qu’il a rencontré il y a 3 ans de cela et qui continue d’apparaître dans ses rêves. En passant par le bureau de son cousin, Tae-Ha, il fait la ‘’rencontre’’ d’un membre du groupe Midnight, Su Hyeon, qui était en train de lui faire une petite faveur. Il déclare que celui-ci est son sponsor et qu’il agit en conséquence.
Seo Jaegyeong, choqué par ce qu’il se passe, est submergé par l’envie de le secouer.
	
Ndt : Lorsqu’un artiste dans le monde du spectacle, souhaite obtenir de gros rôles ou contrats, il tente de trouver un sponsor qui les trouvera pour lui, en échange de "faveurs" généralement sexuelles.
description.ko:
'취미로 배우 하는 재벌 그룹 회장 아들' 재경은
3년 전, 단 한 번 마주친 이후 자꾸 꿈에 나타나 마음을 어지럽히는
기억 속 소년을 잊을 수가 없다.
어느 날 사촌형 태하의 사무실에 들렀다가
그 소년이 태하의 그곳을 삼키고 있는 모습을 직면해 버리고 말았는데.
인지도 고만고만한 아이돌 그룹 '미드나잇'의 수현이,
스폰을 받아서 연명하고 있다기에 그를 찾아갔더니

"내가 누구랑 뭘 하든 무슨 상관이에요."

눈을 동그랗게 뜨고 대드는 수현.
심지어 재경을 기억조차 못하는 듯해 부아가 치민다. 
재경은 그를 흔들어 놓고 싶은 충동에 휩싸이는데..
description.es-la:
Jaekyung, hijo de un grupo chaebol y actor por afición, no puede olvidar al chico que conoció una sola vez hace tres años, que sigue apareciendo en sus sueños y perturbando su mente.  
Pero un día, pasa por la oficina de su primo y se encuentra con ese mismo chico haciéndole una mamada a su primo.

altTitles.zh: 互相借了H书之后成了朋友的女生

title.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Affection

altTitles.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Love
The Villainess Is Shy to Be Loved

altTitles.ja: 悪役なのに愛されすぎています

altTitles.th: สาวน้อยตัวร้ายชักรู้สึกเขินอายที่ได้รับความรัก

description.en:
My wicked mother brought a girl one day, the Duke's lost daughter, Loretta - the heroine of a novel called *The Duke's Four Children*. And I am Melody, the villainess in said novel who was punished alongside my mother for harassing the Duke's precious little girl. I didn’t want to die like that, so I decided to treat her well. I fed Loretta, put her to sleep, and played with her. And then her response was…?

"I hope Melody marries Loretta!"

Through her endless affection, I ended up coming back with her to the Duke's mansion, where she said "I'll stick close to Melody!"

Has there ever been anyone who is such a 'fool for Melody?!' Why am I being loved when I've only been kind to be able to live peacefully…!

---
When Melody discovers she's a villainess in someone else's story, being a slave dealer's daughter only adds to her guilty conscience. After her mother kidnaps Loretta, Duke Baldwin's long-lost child, Melody tries to comfort the scared little girl and forms a sisterly bond with her. So when the duke finds them, he takes both of them home because now they're inseparable! As the rest of House Baldwin becomes enamored with Melody's warm heart, will she ever learn that she deserves to be loved too?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD-%EC%86%8C%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EB%B0%9B%EA%B8%B0%EA%B0%80-%EB%B6%80%EB%81%84%EB%9F%AC%EC%9B%8C%EC%9A%94/3321), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61192421)
description.fr:
Ma méchante mère a amené une fille un jour.
C'était la fille cachée du duc, Loretta, l'héroïne des [Quatre enfants du duc].
Je suis Melody, la méchante qui a été punie par ma mère pour l'avoir harcelée.
Je ne veux pas mourir comme ça, alors je dois bien la traiter maintenant.
J'ai nourri Loretta, je l'ai endormie et j'ai joué avec elle.
Et puis sa réponse a été...
"J'espère que Melody épousera Loretta !"
Le déluge d'affection sans fin m'a conduit à la rejoindre auprès du duc et elle a dit : "Je vais rester près de Mlle Melody."
Avez-vous rencontré quelqu'un qui soit un "fou de Melody" plus qu'elle ?
Pourquoi suis-je aimée alors que j'ai seulement été assez gentille pour me faire vivre paisiblement.... !

title.en: Unaware His Majesty Is a Girl

altTitles.vi: Hoàng đế bệ hạ là nữ lang

altTitles.my: ဘုရင်ကြီးကမိန်းကလေးမှန်းမသိခဲ့ဘူး

altTitles.vi: Không Ngờ Bệ Hạ Là Nữ

description.en:
The new emperor, Qi Nian, acceded to the throne many years ago. He kept refusing the requests by his officials to choose a consort, brushing them off by saying "the affairs of state are important, and I am busy with my work". But Qi Nian finally relented as rumors that "the emperor is impotent" spread ever more widely.

Yu Dingdang was a particularly dim-witted girl, but born to a prestigious family. This led many to say: "Madame Yu exchanged her brain for her looks". Who could have expected that Yu would be selected by the emperor to be his empress consort?

A happy and dramatic girl-girl romantic comedy set in the imperial palace. Yu couldn't have expected that this lofty emperor up on high was actually a girl?!
description.zh: 新帝祁念登基多年，却终日以“国事要紧，朕沉迷工作”，拒绝了朝臣们的选妃请求。但“皇帝不行”的流言愈演愈烈，祁念不胜其烦，终是松口。玉玎珰出身名门，却生了个榆木脑袋，众人纷纷道：“玉家小姐是拿脑子换的脸”却不想，一朝入选，她竟成了国母。玉玎珰表面：啊？什么？是我吗？内心却汹涌澎湃。只因玉玎珰从小便立誓，一！定！要！成！为！祁！念！的！女！人！迷妹追星成功，在皇宫里上演了一系列“她逃她追，她插翅难飞”的啼笑皆非的欢喜故事却不想，这高高在上的至尊帝王，竟是女儿身？！
description.zh-hk: 新帝祁念登基多年，卻終日以“國事要緊，朕沉迷工作”，拒絕了朝臣們的選妃請求。 但「皇帝不行」的流言愈演愈烈，祁念不勝其煩，終是鬆口。 玉玎璫出身名門，卻生了個榆木腦袋，眾人紛紛道：「玉家小姐是拿腦子換的臉」卻不想，一朝入選，她竟成了國母。 玉玎璫表面：啊？ 什麼？ 是我嗎？ 內心卻洶湧澎湃。 只因玉玎璫從小便立誓，一！ 定！ 要！ 成！ 為！ 祁！ 念！ 的！ 女！ 人！ 迷妹追星成功，在皇宮裡上演了一系列「她逃她追，她插翅難飛」的啼笑皆非的歡喜故事卻不想，這高高在上的至尊帝王，竟是女兒身？ ！

altTitles.ja: フェイト／ステイナイト ヘブンズフィール

description.en:
The story takes place in an ordinary Japanese town, Fuyuki City. Hidden from society, there has been a deadly war going on in this town. Seven sorcerers known as "Masters" summon powerful familiars called "Servants," and they all fight each other until the last one. The last one is said to attain the Holy Grail, which will grant them a wish. Only few know when this War started and what the Holy Grail is, but the war is about to begin again this year.  
  
The main character is Emiya Shirou, who lost his parents in a fire and was adopted by a man who called himself a mage. Admiring his stepfather, he has been training himself to be a mage. However, he had no talent and he could barely use even one type of magecraft. His stepfather has already passed away, and today he's a mage without any skills or knowledge. He is involved in the Holy Grail War when he accidentally summons Saber, who is said to be the strongest Servant of all…  
  
Heaven's Feel is one of the routes in Fate/stay night. The heroine of this route is Matou Sakura.
description.ru: Действие разворачивается в обыкновенном японском городке Фуюки. В нем проходит смертельная война, скрытая от общества. Семеро магов, Мастеров, призывают души великих героев прошлого, называемых Слугами, которые сражаются между собой. Последний оставшийся обретет Святой Грааль, способный выполнить желание. Лишь некоторые знают про эту войну и Святой Грааль, но в этом году война начинается вновь.Главный герой - Эмия Широ, потерявший родителей в пожаре и усыновленный человеком, называвшим себя магом. Восхищаясь отчимом, он тренируется чтобы стать чародеем, однако, не обладая талантом, он едва ли может использовать один вид магии. Его отчим умер, и сегодня Широ маг без каких-либо умений и знаний. Он становится участником Войны Святого Грааля, когда случайно призывает Сэйбер - сильнейшую из Слуг…Манга-адаптация "Heaven's Feel" - одного из рутов в эроге "Fate/stay night" от компании Type-Moon. Героиня рута - Мато Сакура.

altTitles.ja: ロングピリオド

description.en:
I hope this feeling disappears quickly.
I'll say the opposite again and again.

Yuusei, a high school student, "hates" his childhood friend Itsuki.
Itsuki, who is a popular genius and a bundle of talent, has been taken out to various places and thrown around for a long time.
Right now, I'm trying to avoid Itsuki so that I don't get involved with him as much as possible, but he keeps getting tangled up with me.
That's why this love will never disappear.
This feeling will never come true.

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---

altTitles.ja: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

altTitles.en: The Old Knight in the Border - Bard Loen

altTitles.ru: Старый рыцарь из приграничных земель - Бард Лоен

altTitles.ja: 辺境の老騎士 バルド・ローエン

altTitles.en: The Old Knight of a Frontier District - Bard Loen

description.en: Abandoning money, fame and honor, the knight Bard embarks on a journey to find his final resting place. Tasting delicious food, admiring the unfamiliar scenery all by himself, his journey to find a place to die quietly begins. What he doesn't know however, is that this is the beginning of a new adventure for him.
description.ru: Отказавшись от золота и славы, рыцарь Бард пускается в путь, чтобы найти свою смерть. В одиночестве наслаждаясь вкусной едой и видами незнакомых земель, он неспешно идёт вперёд, к своему последнему пристанищу.Однако он ещё не знает, что это лишь начало его великого путешествия, о котором будет говорить не одно поколение.

description.en:
What would you do if you are given a second chance to turn back time and relive your past?   
Would you do what you did back then for fear of the butterfly effect?   
Or would you take a different course of action and let the future speaks for itself?  

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/69michichi)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/69erocento)
description.fr:
Que ferriez-vous si il vous était donné la chance de remonter le temps et de revivre votre passé ? Ferriez-vous ce que vous avez fait à l'époque par crainte de l'effet papillon ? Ou voudiez-vous prendre une autre voie et laisser l'avenir parler de lui-même ?  
  
L'histoire d'un voyage dans le temps, une apocalypse zombies, et un homme maladroit qui fait de son mieux pour décrocher le prix du père de l'année en dépit du refus de son enfant anti-social qui le rejette encore et toujours.
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/69michichi)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/69erocento)

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

title.en: After School Labyrinth Adventurer ~ I'm now able to go back and forth between Japan and another world, and I'll work hard to level up~

altTitles.ja-ro: Houkago no Meikyuu Boukensha: Nippon to Isekai wo Ikiki Dekiru You ni Natta Boku wa Level Up ni Isoshimi Masu

altTitles.ja: 放課後の迷宮冒険者～日本と異世界を行き来できるようになった僕はレベルアップに勤しみます～

description.en:
Akira Kudo, a high school student who can freely travel back and forth between Japan and another world, Do Merta. With no goals in mind, he spends his time after school enjoying life in another world as he is!

As an adventurer, he gets teased by the guild's receptionist, receives "rewards" from his magic master, and has fun with the girl he helped...!?

"I hate pain! I don't care about ranking up! Guild requests are also troublesome!"

A leisurely labyrinth exploration fantasy just for after school!

title.en: My Clueless First Friend - Side Stories

altTitles.ja: 事情を知らない転校生がグイグイくる。- Side Stories

altTitles.ja-ro: Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru - Side Stories

altTitles.en: The Clueless Transfer Student Is Assertive. - Side Stories

description.en: Side stories for My Clueless First Friend (Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru) posted on the author's Twitter and Pixiv.

altTitles.ja: だれでも抱けるキミが好き

altTitles.vi: Crush Của Tôi Là Một Đứa Lẳng Lơ

altTitles.en: I Like You Who Can Have Sex With Anyone
I like you who can have sex anyone.

altTitles.es-la: Me Gustas tú, que Puedes tener Sexo con Cualquiera

altTitles.pt-br: Eu goste de você, que pode fazer sexo com qualquer um

description.en:
Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Comic Days](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437), [Magazine Pocket](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)
description.ja: 童貞高校生のゴトウが好きになったのはセックス大好きなギャル・アガワさん。ある日の放課後、彼女が同級生とセックスしているところを見てしまって──。
description.vi: Con đũy tình yêu đã dẫn nam chính của ta đi thích một gyaru lẳng lơ sẵn sàng làm nháy với bất cứ ai. Rồi anh main sẽ làm gì trước cái tình huống NTR nhưng không hẳn này? Khuyến cáo ko dành cho trẻ dưới 18 và các thanh niên không thích NTR. Đọc truyện này đừng lắp đầu trên vào làm gì (lắp đầu dưới thì OK).
description.es-la: Un virgen estudiante de secundaria, por casualidad descubre a la gal de la que se estaba empezando a enamorar teniendo sexo con otro estudiante.
description.pt-br: Uma Gal safada que deixa todo mundo transar com ela e um garoto virgem do ensino médio apaixonado por ela, mesmo depois de vê-la transar com seu colega de classe.

title.en: Danshi Kinsei Majo no Kuni ni Nyotaika Skill de Nyuukoku shite mita

altTitles.ja: 男子禁制魔女の国に女体化スキルで入国してみた

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Kinsei Majo no Kuni ni Nyotaika Skill de Nyuukoku shite mita

altTitles.en: Using Feminization Skills to Enter The Land of Witches, Where Men are Forbidden

altTitles.zh: 试着使用女体化技能进入禁止男人的魔女国度

description.en: "I sneaked into the witch's land, where men are forbidden, using feminization magic!" A guy gets hit by a truck after saving a girl, and gets sent into another world. Unlike other protagonists who get insane cheat skills, he gets a skill that allows him to transform into a girl instead.
description.ja: 「絶対にバレてはいけない。僕が“男”だということを……」　魔女の国。そこは絶対男子禁制の女性だけが入国を許される花園。男子が王都に立ち入れば、即極刑！　そんな王都にある、魔女学園の門を叩く者がいた。名はトワ・ミツミネ。異世界転生してきた男子高校生である。もちろん男のトワには王都に入ることはできないはずだった。しかし、トワは異世界転生時にとあるスキルを手に入れた。それは、“普通の”最強スキルではなく――女の子に変身できる“女体化”スキルだった。しかも女体化状態なら超強力な魔法も使えるようで……！　元男子高校生には刺激的過ぎる女の子しかいない学園生活！　憧れの『最強魔女騎士』めざし、トワのちょっとえっちな女体化ファンタジーライフが始まる！

altTitles.ja: 半人前の恋人

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me...!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

altTitles.ja: 不滅のあなたへ

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

**Links:**  
**Officially Translated:**   
- Alternative English version by [K MANGA](<https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10076/episode/319887>)
- Alternative English version by [Inkr Comics](<https://inkr.page.link/Hmgv5BX51rftn9ar5>)
- In French by [Pika](<https://www.pika.fr/serie/your-eternity>)   
- In Italian by [Star Comics](<https://www.starcomics.com/fumetto.aspx?Fumetto=281315>)   
- In Polish by [Kotori](<http://kotori.pl/nasze-wydania/ku-twej-wiecznosci/>)   
- In Russian by [Istari](<https://istaricomics.com/katalog-knig/manga/istari-comics/to-your-eternity/>)   
- In German by [Egmont](<https://www.egmont-shop.de/to-your-eternity-01.html>)   
- In Indonesian by [m&c!](<http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/untukmu-yang-abadi-01>) as **Untukmu yang Abadi** (2019)
- In Brazilian Portuguese by [NewPOP](<https://www.lojanewpop.com.br/uma-vida-imortal-to-your-eternity-15576289>)
description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

description.en:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

title.en: What, You Dare Pretend in Front of Me, the Strongest in the Immortal World?

altTitles.zh: 你什么档次敢在我仙界最强面前装

altTitles.zh-ro: Ni Shenme Dangci Gan Zai Wo Xianjie Zui Qiang Mianqian Zhuang

altTitles.en: What Quality Do You Dare to Pretend in Front of Me the Strongest in the Immortal World

description.en: The world beyond the ancient mirror and the immortal realm within were originally one entity. The true power of this world lies in the hands of the divine beast with the title “Light,” who battles against a formidable enemy, the divine beast with the title “Dark.” In order to prevent the extinction of humanity, the ancestors of Cheng Song sealed off the immortal realm from the human realm using the ancient mirror, with the assistance of the divine beast of Light. Only those with the bloodline of the Yu family can activate the bronze mirror and enter the immortal realm.

“What?! I'm supposed to be the guardian of this tentacle monster?"
In a research facility specializing in monster biology, Monster Veterinarian Doha finds himself under a slimy assault from a pubescent tentacle monster.

During this encounter, the tentacle monster comes to recognize Doha as its 'maternal figure,' and he ends up becoming its guardian for a year, taking on the responsibility of its training.

However, controlling this tentacle monster, which has an insatiable sexual appetite, proves to be nearly impossible on his own. Eventually, for safety reasons, he is introduced to Kyunghwan, the son of the research facility's director, as his partner.

"Dr. Yoo, if it's okay with you… May I assist with the training?"

title.en: Ore wa Subete o “Parry” Suru: Gyaku Kanchigai no Sekai Saikyou wa Boukensha ni Naritai

altTitles.en: I Parry Everything: What Do You Mean I’m the Strongest? I’m Not Even an Adventurer Yet!
I Will Parry Everything to Become the Greatest Adventurer!

altTitles.uk: Я "парирую" всё: Сильнейший человек в мире хочет стать авантюристом
Я парировал все время, чтобы стать сильнейшим авантюристом

altTitles.ja: 俺は全てを【パリイ】する
俺は全てを【パリイ】する ～逆勘違いの世界最強は冒険者になりたい～
俺は全てを【パリイ】する ~逆勘違いの世界最強は冒険者の夢をみる~

description.en:
This is the tale of a man who had mastered how to “parry.”  
  
“I have no talent at all…”  
  
At the age of 12, a young boy named Noru had decided to train himself in the mountains after being rejected by the capital’s official training centers for being “talentless.” He believed that, with enough hard work and effort, he could one day become like the protagonists that populate his childhood stories. Full of determination, he would practice every day with his makeshift wooden sword, endlessly repeating the only sword technique he knew—“parry.” The hours turned into days, the days turned into months, and the months turned into years. Eventually, he had trained this one skill to such an extreme that he could snap a thousand branches with it. However, no matter how hard he tried, he couldn’t get the desired result, he couldn’t learn any new skills required to become a real adventurer. It may be time to let go of his dream. But he couldn’t. Not just yet. Knowing this, he returned to the capital again.  
  
This was a man of endless dedication, a man who used that dedication to become one of the strongest in the world. The only problem is, he didn’t know it yet.  
  
WN: <https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6537fu/>

altTitles.ja: 世話焼きマフィアと薄幸少女

altTitles.en: The Meddlesome Mafia and The Hapless Girl

description.en:
A girl who was sold by her mother and left without relatives is taken in by the boss of the most terrifying Chinese mafia. She thought her life was over, but she was taken to a luxury boutique to get clothes...?!

"Don't be mistaken. These favors from me are so that I can sell you at a high price."

A love comedy between a tough-looking boy with a sharp attitude and a cute girl with a good heart!

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

altTitles.zh: 孤單一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.zh-ro: Duzi Yi Ren De Yi Shijie Gonglüe

altTitles.zh-hk: 獨自一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.th: นายโดดเดี่ยวพิชิตต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.en: Starting Today She's My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja: 今日おさ

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)

A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED ASTRAY

description.en:
A side story manga set in the Cosmic Era timeline that takes place concurrently with *Mobile Suit Gundam SEED*. 
It is one part of the first wave of the *SEED Astray* multimedia project. 
Whereas the main story of *Gundam SEED* focuses on the struggles between the Earth Alliance, ZAFT, and Orb Union, the Astray series is focused on the three MBF-P mobile suit prototypes and their respective pilots and organizations, who mainly exist on the outskirts of the main SEED storyline. 

The MBF-P02 Gundam Astray Red Frame is piloted by Lowe Guele of the Junk Guild, and the MBF-P03 Gundam Astray Blue Frame is piloted by Murakumo Gai of the mercenary group Serpent Tail. 
The third Astray, MBF-P01 Gundam Astray Gold Frame, is piloted by the primary antagonist of the Astray story, Orb nobleman Rondo Gina Sahaku, and later by his twin sister Rondo Mina Sahaku. 
[Via Gundam Wiki] 

**Notes:**
- The Re:Master edition includes ASTRAY and X ASTRAY with the extra chapters moved to different spots.

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The original run was from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 38.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

altTitles.ja: まるごとしんこんまぞく (まちカドまぞく)

description.en: Basically, this manga follows Hibino Hareluya as he tries to "conquer the world" by dealing with the everyday punks on the street. Always ready to fight and always winning his fights, he just finds himself in more and more trouble. Along the way he surrounds himself with friends who are all very strong in their own unique way.
